participant_1.background:
I write in my journal to clear my head.
my favorite movie genre is horror.

I love to listen to the avert brother while working on cases for the federal court.
i have 2 sisters.

unfortunately , my family lives across the country from me.

content.text: Hey there. How are you doing?
Not bad, thanks. Just got back from a workout. You?
Not bad. Just finished writing in my journal. I love writing to clear my head. What do you do to clear your head?
I usually go for a run. I used to love basketball but my mom went crazy when I was three and I haven't seen her since.
Wow, that's intense. I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm sure you're doing great though!
Thanks, I'm trying! I have a good support system and I love my job.
What do you do for work?
I'm a lawyer. I work in the federal court. It's pretty interesting, but it can be stressful.
Oh, that's really cool! I'm sure it's very rewarding. What kind of cases do you work on?
I mostly work on immigration cases. I love helping people get their visas and become citizens.
That's amazing! I'm sure you're doing a great job.
Thank you! I'm trying my best.
Well, I'm sure you're going to do great things. I'm rooting for you!
